summary: This mod adds a lvl 30+ mage follower to The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a female mage follower based off of Dakota Rose to The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.  She\'s made with the cbbe body that will not affect your game and your game should not affect her. Dorian starts as a level 30 Destruction Mage (level 5 version available) and will level up with your character.

All assets required to run this mod are included. No need to download any other mods. The parts of other mods that have been used will download and be placed where they belong. Enjoy!

[center][b]Level 30 Destruction Mage[/b]
BRETON

One-Handed - 15
Two-Handed - 15
Marksman - 15
Block - 15
Smithing - 15
Sneak - 57
Heavy Armor - 15
Light Armor - 15
Pickpocket - 15
Lockpicking - 15
Alchemy - 20
Speechcraft - 20
Alteration - 62
Conjuration - 46
Destruction - 78
Illusion - 20
Restoration - 84
Enchanting - 15[/center]


[color=blue]COMPATIBLE WITH:[/color] Amazing Follower Tweaks, and Ultimate Follower Overhaul.
Should be compatible with most follower mods but I have not tested them all. If anyone would like to do this and give feedback it would be greatly appreciated. <3

[color=blue]MODS I USED TO CREATE DORIAN:[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35327]SG Eyebrows[/url] by Hellosanta.
Can\'t think of any others that aren\'t included in the mod but I could be wrong. Please let me know if there are any other discrepencies and I\'ll see if I can figure out what it is.


[center][size=5][color=red]Potential Optional Files[/color][/size][/center]
Oblivion Hair for Hoodless Dorian?
More Potent Dorian for our hardcore players!


[center][size=10][color=red]Installation[/color][/size][/center]

Manually copy & paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
It\'s generally C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\
Make sure to activate DorianFollower.esp in Data files in the game launcher.


[center][size=10][color=red]Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center]

Delete these files:
Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\DorianFollower
Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\APDorian
Data\\Textures\\armors\\tribunalrobes
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\APDorian
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\DorianFollower
Data\\meshes\\tribunalrobes
Data\\DorianFollower.esp



[center][size=10][color=red]Frequently Asked Questions[/color][/size][/center]

Q. Is Dorian marriageable?
A. Yes.

Q. Do/change blahblahblah for me, please.
A. This is simply a follower based off of my character. I have no intentions of changing anything but am willing to tell you how to do so yourself. However, I do take suggestions for new followers.

Q. Followers\' appearances doesn\'t look like your screen shots.
A. Try manual installing rather than NMM. NMM can cause some file structuring errors.



[center][size=10][color=red]Credits[/color][/size][/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/]Caliente\'s Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077/]Tribunal Robes and Masks[/url] by Natterforme
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110/]Oblivion Hair[/url] by Radioragae


[b][color=red]KNOWN ISSUES:[/color][/b]
** Possible character creation conflict with the Temptress Race
....... SOLUTION: The hair issue should clear itself up if you Load Dorian before the Temptress Race. Possibly a good idea to load her before other custom races as well.

** Hoodless version can have minor bugs depending on person. Getting more positive reports than negative but it is still something I am looking into.
author: Arcadian Phoenix
